resources.string:
Japris is application for calling you family and order food to your housemaid or some people on your phone through email apps. 
First insert your name at start page. Then select menu "Call Family" or "Order Food". 
You can add your family member and phone number. 

Made for completing the course for Indonesia Android Kejar Certification Batch III. 
My class was mentored by Mudassir at Gedung Aula Dinas Kominfo Makassar, 18-19 November 2017
